forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could be severe. Partly sunny. High near 96, with temperatures falling to around 88 in the afternoon. Heat index values as high as 102. West wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Scattered Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms before 10pm. Some of the storms could be severe. Partly cloudy, with a low around 68. Northwest wind 6 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
In Boston today, the atmosphere hangs heavy with the promise of rain, a backdrop for a day that balances the high energy of summer with the brewing tension of a storm. As the sun peeks through the scattered clouds and casts a warm glow, temperatures rise to nearly 96, though they will cool into the afternoon only slightly, offering a relentless embrace of humidity. The air thickens with heat index values that flirt with 102, painting the scene with a palpable warmth that speaks of activity both indoors and out, though caution is advised as the skies may rattle with ominous thunder and brilliant flashes of lightning.

As the sun surrenders to twilight, the opportunity for scattered storms continues until nightfall, a prelude to a cooler evening, dipping to around 68. Dressing in light, breathable fabrics will grant comfort during the day, with perhaps a light layer handy for later when the breeze whispers through the air. The evening calls for quieter pursuits—perhaps a stroll through one of Boston’s historic neighborhoods, where the architecture serves as a reminder of the past, or a leisurely read at a café where the aroma of roasted coffee mingles with the rain-washed scent of the pavement. Keep an ear attuned to the distant rumbles of thunder, letting them be the soundtrack to a relaxed and contemplative evening.
